quote: We must be in heaven, man!
City McGee, please come immediately to backstage right. I understand your wife is having a baby. Congratulations.
You've seen the heavy groups, now get ready for some morning maniac music.
The New York State thruway is closed, man!

The warning that I received, you may take with however many grains of salt you wish, that the brown acid that is circulating around us, is specifically not too good. It's suggested that you do stay away from that; of course, it's your own trip, so, be my guest. But, please be advised that there is a warning on that one.
I was gonna wait awhile, but, before we talked about it. But, maybe we'll talk about it now so you can think about it. Its a free concert from now on!

We apologize for the, em, the noise of the choppity-chop... It seems there are a few cars blocking the road. So, we're flying everybody in! I almost made the worst pun of the world about high musicians, but, we'll skip that.
...a half a million young people can get together and have three days of fun and music and have nothing *but* fun and music, and I God bless you for it!
The forecast for this afternoon is: intermittent entertainment between intermittent showers.
